info.name: PersonalProfile Check Entitlement
info.description: Below harness execute cases to check if all entitlements of personal profile can  be add/edit/deleted

item.name: 1.Login
Login as Retail User

request.description: Login API

item.name: 2.Entitlements
Revoking access for Transfers

script.exec: tests["Transfers is revoked for specified user"] = responseCode.code === 204;

request.description: This case will revoke an entitlment for Transfers

item.name: Get Transfers for logged in user

script.exec: tests["Response have Transfers as entitlement false"] = responseBody.has("<d:Entitled>false</d:Entitled>");

request.description: Get Transfers for logged in user

item.name: Granting access for Transfers

script.exec: tests["Transfers is granted for speciefied user"] = responseCode.code === 204;

request.description: This case will revoke an entitlment for Transfers

item.name: Get Transfers for logged in user- check granted Permission

script.exec: tests["Response have Transfers as entitlement as true"] = responseBody.has("<d:Entitled>true</d:Entitled>");

request.description: Get Transfers for logged in user

item.name: Revoking access to Payments

script.exec: tests["Payments is revoked for specified user"] = responseCode.code === 204;

request.description: Revoking access to Payments

item.name: Get Payments for Logged in user

script.exec: tests["Response have payments as entitlement as false"] = responseBody.has("<d:Entitled>false</d:Entitled>");

request.description: Get Payments for Logged in user

item.name: Granting access to Payments

script.exec: tests["Payments is granted for specified user"] = responseCode.code === 204;

request.description: Revoking access to Payments

item.name: Get Payments for Logged in user- check granted permission

script.exec: tests["Response have payments as entitlement true"] = responseBody.has("<d:Entitled>true</d:Entitled>");

request.description: Get Payments for Logged in user

item.name: 4. Entitlements with Accounts
*Get Accounts for logged in user

request.description: Get Accounts for logged in user

item.name: Revoking access for Transfers To for a particular account

script.exec: tests["Transfers to is revoked for account 660110110-2732731-1"] = responseCode.code === 204;

request.description: Revoking access for Transfers To for a particular account

item.name: Get Transfers to for logged in user for a particular account

script.exec: tests["Response have Transfers To as entitlement false"] = responseBody.has("<d:Entitled>false</d:Entitled>");

request.url: {{env}}/cb/odata/services/retailuserservice/PersonalProfiles('{{id}}')/Entitlements?$filter=OperationName eq 'Transfers To' and ObjectType eq 'Account' and ObjectId eq '{{Account}}'
request.description: Get Transfers to for logged in user for a particular account

item.name: Grant access for Transfers To for a particular account

script.exec: tests["Transfers to is revoked for account 660110110-2732731-1"] = responseCode.code === 204;

request.description: Grant access for Transfers To for a particular account copy

item.name: Get Transfers to for logged in user for a particular account

script.exec: tests["Response have Transfers as entitlement"] = responseBody.has("<d:Entitled>true</d:Entitled>");

request.url: {{env}}/cb/odata/services/retailuserservice/PersonalProfiles('{{id}}')/Entitlements?$filter=OperationName eq 'Transfers To' and ObjectType eq 'Account' and ObjectId eq '{{Account}}'
request.description: Get Transfers to for logged in user for a particular account
